function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Migration of people, goods, and vehicles across borders and seas translocates vectors and pathogens to new areas.","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases to new areas, increasing the potential for outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implement strict border controls, quarantine measures, and health screening for travelers and goods.","Technologies":"Advanced scanning and detection technologies for early identification of pathogens and vectors in transported goods and people.","People":"Population in areas with high migration flows, travelers, border control and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations, and international bodies."},{"Description":"Natural disasters and armed conflicts disrupt existing medical services and contribute to landscape changes, leading to increased vulnerability to disease outbreaks.","Impact":"Decreased access to medical care, increased exposure to disease vectors, and altered ecological conditions that favor disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Preparedness planning for medical service continuity during disasters, proactive vector control measures, and ecological surveillance for disease risk.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile medical units, and remote monitoring systems for disaster-affected areas. Advanced vector control methods and ecological modeling for disease surveillance.","People":"Disaster-affected populations, healthcare providers in affected areas, and wildlife/ecosystem experts.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, disaster management agencies, and ecological research institutions."},{"Description":"Movement between low-and high-risk areas contributes to the spread of drug-resistant and emerging infectious diseases.","Impact":"Increased transmission of drug-resistant and emerging diseases, leading to challenges in treatment and control.","Mitigation":"Promote education and awareness of disease risks, implement targeted prevention strategies for high-risk areas, and improve surveillance and reporting of infectious diseases.","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing for drug resistance surveillance, mobile health apps for disease education, and digital reporting systems for infectious disease monitoring.","People":"Populations in high-risk areas, healthcare workers, and travelers between low-and high-risk regions.","Owner":"Public health organizations, government health departments, and international health agencies."}]}
